thought: The Slack action (action_1) is currently missing the required parameters, causing the workflow execution to fail. I will set the parameters properly to send text messages to the 'general' channel, including the required 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' parameters.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to specify sending to a channel.
Set 'channelId' mode to 'name' and value to 'general' to target the 'general' Slack channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' to send simple text messages.
Set 'text' parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract the message text from input_data.
Test the Slack action to confirm messages are sent successfully.
criticism: Without these parameters, Slack action cannot send messages and causes workflow failure.

tool_input.comments: Send formatted messages to Slack channel 'general' with proper parameters.
TODO: Verify messages appear in the 'general' channel.
